## FlushStrategy type

A flush strategy controls when effect re-runs execute.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FlushStrategy = {
    run: () => void | (() => void);
    create: (track: EffectDeps['track']) => (node: EffectNode) => void;
};
```
**References:** [EffectNode](../effectnode/)
